salaar library used know the relationship of the khaansaar kingdom and know the vote count of persons of same
use names as "dhaara", "devaratha_raisaar", "shiva_mannar", "raja_mannar", "varadha_raj_mannar" baachi", "rudra", "radha_rama", "om", "narang", "vishnu", baarava
use tribe names as shouryaanga, mannar, ghaniyar
